title: A Serious and faithfull representation of the judgments of ministers of the Gospel within the the province of London contained in a letter from the to the general and his councell of war / delivered to His Excellence by some of the subscribers, Ian. 18, 1649.
author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh by Evan Tyler ...,
